Transcription for 1215391

Natasha. She lives in South Africa. She's the bestest friend I've ever, ever, ever had.
She's like a family member to me. We do everything together, we laugh together, we share stories
together, we enjoy each other's company, and we just get on really well.
Speak to each other every day, probably without fail, and we just have a laugh together, as
I said. We just have fun together. It's just great. I just wish she was here.
